message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  That price is a bit high for me, could you do $100?
I understand that $170 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about $110?
I'm still a bit above your target price, Bob. I can try to meet you at $130. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, my budget is $120, so I can do that, but I won't be able to go any higher.
I understand that $120 is your absolute limit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. It's the best I can do.
